extendedInfo.description: TouchWiz Clock (Similar to the one on Galaxy S 4).- Original backgrounds, icons & fonts- All weather conditions for Yahoo Weather API- HD Resolution (1018x627)2 hotspots:- Clock- Update weather=== Requirement ===You need UCCW to use this skin http://goo.gl/q0KSt=== How to use ===Long press on home screen > Widgets > UCCW 4x2 > TouchWiz ClockEnable hotspot mode in UCCW to launch clock when you tap on the clock & update weather when you tap on weather icon=== Modifying ===Disable hotspot mode in UCCW & tap on the skin to editIf you want to make advanced changes, you have to download the .uzip version from http://android.dsaif.com/store/?dir=UCCW%20Skins/TouchWiz%20Clock=== Credit ===Thanks to XDA Member lrft for the apk filehttp://forum.xda-developers.com/member.php?u=4614117=== Follow ===Blog: http://dsaif.tumblr.comTwitter: http://twitter.com/DSaifDesignGoogle Plus: http://plus.google.com/103839899698883057169=== Contact / Feedback / Request ===Email me if you need any help. I'll reply within few hours.

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Weather widget is good but background weather view is not same as in s4
reviews.author: Muhammad Awais

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Works perfectly but if it had the \"last updated\" part at the bottom right it will improve it\'s appearance
reviews.author: Kenneth Mbova

reviews.title: The background doesn\'t show up!!!
reviews.comment: I was very happy when I installed this app, then after a few minutes the background doesn\'t shows up! Even I cleared the data!!!! Please fix it.
reviews.author: Chester Cabahug

reviews.title: This big?
reviews.comment: Application with this big of file just for a weather n clock widget? Need to know after completely downloaded n installed, then decide to uninstall or keep it. Better worth it with 48 mb !
reviews.author: Febry Janto

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: I installed the app but can\'t find a way to launch it. No app or widget shortcut was created after installation. How unfortunate, I want the s4 clock widget badly.
reviews.author: Mark Jayson Mortel

reviews.title: So much better now!
reviews.comment: I have the background now..This is awesome!
reviews.author: lorenz leynes

reviews.title: Not S4 background
reviews.comment: It is not galaxy s4 background in the widget. not exactly the same with the poster of s4. but quite good & helpful
reviews.author: Jason Yuen

reviews.title: Background missing
reviews.comment: Background doesn\'t show up, pressing widget hotspot brings you top edit page. Else it looks great, need top fix it
reviews.author: Ong Vincent

reviews.title: Great widget! :D
reviews.comment: Works fine on my phone though could you pease add an option to make the background a lil\' bit transparent?
reviews.author: Vlad Dimson

reviews.title: A good start, but...
reviews.comment: It has potential, but it doesn\'t work right. The rain weather pic isn\'t even there. For the most part it\'s on its way.
reviews.author: O Parks

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: Can you make more hotspot? Such as clock, calendar, weather app and refresh weather. Thank you and I am looking forward for your update.
reviews.author: Gouki Hiew

reviews.title: Looks cool but .......
reviews.comment: Only says cloudy and hotspots only locks app does not redirect you.
reviews.author: Jared Lingle

reviews.title: Where are settings?
reviews.comment: This widget is displaying correct time and temp and location but there are no settings.  I do not get the UCCW settings no matter where I press.  I also have the G3_ish skin installed and that works perfectly but not so this skin.  Please help.....
reviews.author: Karen Spindler

reviews.title: Astra user
reviews.comment: Now i know how its good
reviews.author: Chrolo Lucilfer

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Its nice changes the them to what weather it is nd just one lil fix make it full screen like more up if you know what im saying
reviews.author: naser dahmes

reviews.title: Background doesn\'t show
reviews.comment: At first it shows background, the next day it doesn\'t show background even after I updated the weather. Need a lot of improvement for a 48mb file.
reviews.author: Ferdian Leonarta

reviews.title: No uzip file
reviews.comment: The widget is good, but the link does not have a uZip file. Plus there is not rain picture.
reviews.author: Aleksa Jankovic

reviews.title: Superb..!!
reviews.comment: Original Just like S4... But I need to ask that the Backgrounds don\'t change. i.e its showing same \" Dark Blue\" one since last 12 hours... Please fix that... Overall very excellent app... Thank you... ;)
reviews.author: mayank ahuja

reviews.title: solo una vez funciono
reviews.comment: lo instale con nova launcher en un S4 y solo funciono una vez, luego no volvio a cambiar las imagenes a cualquier hora dice que esta asoleado incluso en la noche y ahora lo reinstalo y sale transparente, la idea esta buena pero no sirve.
reviews.author: Enrique Vidales
